portals.title: Portals
portals.description: Which portals to scrape. Allowed values: "sreality", "bezrealitky".

categories.title: Property Categories
categories.description: Which property types to scrape. Allowed values: "domy", "byty", "pozemky".

regions.title: Regions
regions.description: Czech regions to filter by (leave empty for all of Czech Republic). Valid values: Praha, Středočeský, Jihočeský, Plzeňský, Karlovarský, Ústecký, Liberecký, Královéhradecký, Pardubický, Vysočina, Jihomoravský, Olomoucký, Zlínský, Moravskoslezský.

maxPrice.title: Max Price (CZK)
maxPrice.description: Maximum listing price in CZK. Use 0 for no limit.

minArea.title: Min Floor Area (m²)
minArea.description: Minimum usable floor area in m². Use 0 for no limit.

maxItems.title: Max Items
maxItems.description: Maximum total number of listings to scrape across all portals. Use 0 for no limit.
